outputs.output_descr:
This phase titled "Enhancing the capacity of local actors in efforts to improve Peace and Stability in North Africa, the Sahel and Great Lakes" will focus on strengthening the capacities of national institutions in African countries and in Egypt in three areas, namely crisis management, border management, peace-building and peace-keeping, with the overall objective of enhancing efforts aimed at improving peace and stability in North Africa, the Sahel and Great Lakes regions. It aims to achieve the following outputs:
- Improved knowledge in border management in North Africa and the Sahel
- Greater understanding of and improved skills in Peacekeeping and Peacebuilding issues in North Africa, the Sahel and the Great Lakes Region
- Improved knowledge and skills in conflict resolution and crisis management in North Africa, the Sahel and the Great Lakes Region
